title: Spear

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> The two people you attack must be adjacent on the role list. Dead players are considered to not be on the player list for this ability.

> You can choose to only attack 1 person. You will attack them with a piercing attack, which is a Powerful attack that ignores all protective effects on the target.
